      • getDataEntriesWithTimeDifferenceWithNext

        public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.TreeMap<java.sql.Timestamp,DataEntry>> getDataEntriesWithTimeDifferenceWithNext(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.TreeMap<java.sql.Timestamp,DataEntry>> mapForAllData)
        Takes in the mapForAllData comprising of TrajectoryEntries, adds 'time difference with next in seconds' to all the TrajectoryEntries in it and returns the enriched map. And writes time difference between consecutive trajectory entries to a file names '..TimeDifferenceAll.csv' with columns UserID,TimeDifferenceWithNextInSeconds.
        Parameters:
        mapForAllData -
        Returns:
